content:
Check:
  all:
    - name:
      operator:
    - name: ARMCD
      operator: non_empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0523
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Trigger error when ARMCD is populated for a subject who was not assigned
  to treatment
Outcome:
  Message: ARMCD is populated for a subject who was not assigned to treatment
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0523
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Both ARMCD and ACTARMCD will be null for subjects
                  who were not assigned to treatment.  The same reason will provide
                  the reason that both are null.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Item: Assumption 4
                Section: '5.2'
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - SPECIAL-PURPOSE
  Domains:
    Include:
      - DM

json.Description: Trigger error when ARMCD is populated for a subject who was not assigned to treatment

Outcome.Message: ARMCD is populated for a subject who was not assigned to treatment

Citations.Cited_Guidance: Both ARMCD and ACTARMCD will be null for subjects who were not assigned to treatment.  The same reason will provide the reason that both are null.
